pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:0.2: The monks’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:0.5: 75. The training rule on defecating in water
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.2: At that time the monks from the group of six were defecating, urinating, and spitting in water.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.4: “How can the Sakyan ascetics defecate, urinate, and spit in water? They are just like householders who indulge in worldly pleasures!”
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.5: The monks heard the complaints of those people,
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.6: and the monks of few desires complained and criticized those monks,
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.7: “How can the monks from the group of six do this?” …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.8: “Is it true, monks, that you do this?”
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.11: “… Foolish men, how can you do this?
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.12: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.13: And, monks, this training rule should be recited like this:
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.14.1: ‘“I will not defecate, urinate, or spit in water,” this is how you should train.’
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:1.15: In this way the Buddha laid down this training rule for the monks.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.1: Soon afterwards, being afraid of wrongdoing, sick monks did not defecate, urinate, or spit in water.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.3: Soon afterwards he gave a teaching and addressed the monks:
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.4: “Monks, I allow a sick monk to defecate, urinate, or spit in water.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.5: And so, monks, this training rule should be recited like this:
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.6.1: ‘“When not sick, I will not defecate, urinate, or spit in water,” this is how you should train.’
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.7: If one is not sick, one should not defecate, urinate, or spit in water.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.8: If, out of disrespect, a monk who is not sick defecates, urinates, or spits in water, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.14: if he does it on dry ground, but it then spreads to water;
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.18: if he is overwhelmed by pain;
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.19: if he is the first offender.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.20: The fifteenth training rule is finished.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.21: The seventh sub-chapter on shoes is finished.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.22: “Venerables, the rules to be trained in have been recited.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.23: In regard to this I ask you,
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.29: You are pure in this and therefore silent. I will remember it thus.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.30: The rules to be trained in are finished.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk75:2.31: The chapter on training is finished.
